---
id: GetSingleCurrencyAsset
title: Get a single currency asset
sidebar_label: Get a single currency asset
sidebar_position: 2
---

**Type:** GET

**Description:** `/spot/v4/balance`

### Parameters

| name     | type   | mandatory | default | description | ranges |
| -------- | ------ | --------- | ------- | ----------- | ------ |
| currency | string | true      |         | eg: usdt    |        |

### Response Example

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "currency": "usdt",
    "currencyId": 0,
    "frozenAmount": 0,
    "availableAmount": 0,
    "totalAmount": 0,
    "convertBtcAmount": 0 //Converted BTC amount
  }
}
```
